snippet: Viswanathan Anand, the world champion, is also the game’s best-paid player, according to a recent analysis by a fellow competitor.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column observes that Viswanathan Anand, the world champion, is also the game’s best-paid player, according to a recent analysis by a fellow competitor.
lead_paragraph: Viswanathan Anand, the world champion, is also the game’s best-paid player, according to a recent analysis by a fellow competitor.

headline.print_headline: Following the Money Trail For the World’s Best Players
headline.seo: Chess: Anand Said to Be Best-Paid Player
headline.main: Following the Money Trail for the World’s Best Players
